markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 5"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Dagger of Eternal Sleep](/Equipment.aspx?ID=564)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Necromancy" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=117" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Gods & Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=17) pg. 121 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Price** 25 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

**Access** follower of  Achaekek 

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This tiny serrated dagger looks like a miniature [sawtooth sabre](/Weapons.aspx?ID=65). Until activated, it is too small and ornamental to function as a weapon, which might allow it to be passed off as a weapon-shaped decoration.

<document level="2" id="action-351" />

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Dagger of Eternal Sleep
